SYN_PT_2_2:
PROCEDURE: Electromagnetic navigational bronchoscopy with dye marking.
INDICATION: Right upper lobe pulmonary nodule planned for resection.
FINDINGS: The airway examination was unremarkable. Using the SuperDimension navigation system, the catheter was guided to the RUL target. Radial EBUS confirmation was attempted. Isocyanine green (ICG) dye was injected subpleurally to facilitate id[REDACTED] during the subsequent robotic assisted thoracoscopic surgery.
